name: Star-Lord

abilities.name: Element Gun
abilities.details: Fires his signature Element Guns. Might have minor element effects.

abilities.name: Jet Boot Flight
abilities.details: Uses his boot jets for sustained flight. Consumes fuel.

abilities.name: Gravity Mine
abilities.details: Throws a mine that activates after a short delay, pulling nearby enemies towards its center.

abilities.name: Combat Slide
abilities.details: Performs a quick slide, potentially allowing shooting while sliding.

ultimate.name: Awesome Mix Vol. X
ultimate.effect: Plays music creating a field: Buffs ally movement speed & reload speed, slightly slows enemies.
ultimate.details: Uses his mixtape to control the tempo of the fight. Lasts ~8 seconds.

passives.name: Legendary Outlaw
passives.details: Reloads faster while sliding or using Jet Boots.

lore: Peter Quill, abducted from Earth as a child, became the spacefaring adventurer Star-Lord. Leader of the Guardians of the Galaxy, he relies on his wits, gadgets, and piloting skills.

comics.title: Guardians of the Galaxy (various series, particularly Abnett/Lanning)
